overviewMeta.lessDescription: Adityaraj Breeze offers 1 BHK and 2 BHK apartments with an impactful design. The flooring is provided with superior quality vitrified tiles and anti-skid tiles in the toilets, balcony, and kitchen area. Adityaraj Breeze Vikhroli delivers 149 units in a single tower of 21 floors. Adityaraj Breeze offers some of the most conveniently designed Apartments. Adityaraj Breeze Image gives a stunning look as the builder provides oil distemper paint on exterior walls. Adityaraj Breeze interior walls are also painted with oil paint. The adjoining area of Breeze Vikhroli is developed with modern and artistic infrastructure buildings
overviewMeta.moreDescription:
Adityaraj Breeze Vikhroli offers the best location in an improved surrounding place having a large number of residential apartments, buildings, and complexes. Adityaraj Breeze Vikhroli presents an exclusive opportunity to own a stunning home that offers all kinds of amenities and facilities. Adityaraj Vikhroli includes a sewage treatment plant, rainwater harvesting, and easy access to 24/7 power backup. Breeze Vikhroli also has a 24/7 water supply, an exclusive offering only for Adityaraj Breeze residents. Adityaraj Breeze Vikhroli has an excellent combination of comfort and convenience to suit every requirement as well as need.


Adityaraj Breeze Mumbai is located in Vikhroli East. Adityaraj Breeze is close to the commercial hub, Bandra-Kurla Complex (BKC) at a distance of 12 Km. Vikhroli Railway Station is on the Central Line of Suburban Railways and provides easy access to the rest of Mumbai. Breeze Vikhroli is close to the best hospitals located nearby this area such as Shushrusha Hospital and Godrej Memorial Hospital. Adityaraj Breeze offers the best Amenities with Power Backup, Fire Sprinklers, 24X7 Water Supply, Cycling track, Children's Play Area, Jogging Track, Yoga/Meditation Area, Entrance Lobby, Senior Citizen Sit-out, Party Lawn, Gazebo, CCTV, Gymnasium, 24x7 Security and many more.  Adityaraj Breeze Vikhroli also enjoys a mesmerizing view of Mangroves and the City.

Adityaraj Breeze is one of the spacious projects spread over an area of 0.2 acres.
Adityaraj Breeze Vikhroli delivers 149 units in a single tower of 21 floors.

Adityaraj Breeze Vikhroli offers Modern Lifestyle With Rooftop Amenities in Vikhroli.
Breeze Vikhroli is Surrounded by Natural Greenery and Landscape Parks.
Adityaraj Group offers a stunning home that offers all kinds of amenities and facilities.
Breeze enjoys close proximity to Vikhroli Railway Station and the upcoming Vikhroli-Ghonsoli Bridge.
Adityaraj Group provides comfort and convenience to suit every requirement as well as need.
Breeze Vikhroli East Offers Secured Gated Compound With Security Cabin.
